org.apache.openjpa.persistence
Class ExtentImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.openjpa.persistence.ExtentImpl<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<T>, Extent<T>
public class ExtentImpl<T>
extends Object
implements Extent<T>

An extent is a logical view of all instances of a class.

Since:
0.4.1
Author:
Abe White
